pr_title: [ML] make InferenceIngestIT more lenient when checking cache miss counts

timeline.message: [ML] make InferenceIngestIT more lenient when checking cache miss counts

timeline.bodyText:
If I see correctly, the pattern of parsing the response and verifying getInferenceCount is repeated 4 times.
Please consider extracting the snippet to a separate method parameterized by the expected inference count.
timeline.author: przemekwitek
